title: ðŸš¨ J.J. Watt signs with the Arizona Cardinals - Emergency Podcast (Football 3/1)
description:
J.J. Watt has a new team. After 10 years with the Texans and a couple weeks on the hunt for a fresh organization, the 3-time Defensive Player of the Year is signing with the Cardinals. Watt said he wanted to join a contender...Well, is he? Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech break down the move on this emergency podcast including the contract he received and the potential for the Arizona defense in 2021.Â 
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."

content:encoded:
J.J. Watt has a new team. After 10 years with the Texans and a couple weeks on the hunt for a fresh organization, the 3-time Defensive Player of the Year is signing with the Cardinals. Watt said he wanted to join a contender...Well, is he? Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech break down the move on this emergency podcast including the contract he received and the potential for the Arizona defense in 2021.Â 

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 

You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
